E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 6/26/1974
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Gene Stone



Date: Friday, 6/27/1974
Subject: Progress of Jerry Hairston Sr.
Dear Sir,
Jerry Hairston Sr. is hitting the ball well at AA San Antonio Brewers!
He has an AVG of .281, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
